org.hibernate.cache

Interface Cache

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    OptimisticCache
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HashtableCache
    Deprecated. 
    As of 3.3; see for details.

    public interface Cache
    Implementors define a caching algorithm. All implementors must be threadsafe.
